definition: The term refers to the process or activity of constructing residential buildings or housing units. It commonly denotes the development and creation of new living spaces, including apartments or houses, typically for the purpose of accommodating people.

examples.german: Der Wohnungsbau in der Stadt ist sehr teuer.
examples.english: Housing construction in the city is very expensive.

examples.german: Die Regierung f√∂rdert den sozialen Wohnungsbau.
examples.english: The government supports social housing construction.

examples.german: Der Wohnungsbau boomt in dieser Region.
examples.english: Housing construction is booming in this region.

examples.german: Es gibt viele Bauprojekte im Bereich Wohnungsbau.
examples.english: There are many construction projects in the field of housing construction.

examples.german: Der Wohnungsbau ist ein wichtiger Wirtschaftszweig.
examples.english: Housing construction is an important sector of the economy.
